mapper.select: SELECT m.mac_no macNo, m.mac_name macName, concat_ws("/",m.mac_no,m.mac_name) macMsg, m.mac_type macType, m.mac_status macStatus, m.spec spec, c.org_name orgName, p.period_time periodTime, p.before_time beforeTime, p.behind_time behindTime, p.run_total runTotal FROM prod_mac_plm p LEFT JOIN mes_jingcai.machine_set_mes m ON p.mac_no = m.mac_no AND p.company_id = m.company_id AND m.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN hcm.cas_org c ON c.id = m.org_id AND c.company_id = m.company_id AND c.deleted = 'F' WHERE p.crafwork_id = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND p.prod_no = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.mid_prod_no = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND p.deleted = 'F'
